scene.name: intro
scene.line: A dirt road runs into the forest. The path is worn by large tire tracks. A sign is posted but the lettering has been smudged away by rain. It might say something about a grove, or a stockyard.

option.insertedText: Conway and Shannon drive down the path.

scene.name: down-path
scene.line: The truck's headlights briefly glimmer on unknown surfaces between the trees. Ahead, the path winds to the right.

option.insertedText: They get out of the truck and walk in the woods.

scene.option: Get out of the truck and walk into the woods.

scene.name: ahead
scene.line: Conway and Shannon pull up to a small hill with a view onto a clearing.

scene.name: woods
scene.line: Conway and Shannon push aside collapsed branches and spiderwebs. The material of the forest gives way to rusty, painted metal.

scene.name: graveyard
scene.line: Dozens of corroded pickup trucks, some broken into pieces by years of seasonal heating and cooling, clog the forest floor.
